sqlGroup.sql: from( select t1.*,DATE_ADD(t3.last_connect_time,INTERVAL 180 second) >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as 'isOnline',t3.dateTime from userproject t1 LEFT JOIN project t2 ON t1.codeId=t2.codeId AND t1.accessTag=t2.accessTag LEFT JOIN realtimedata t3 ON t2.codeId=t3.id where 1=1 <% if(!isEmpty(userId)){ %> AND t1.userId = #'$userId$'# <% } %> )t
